Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed to meet your needs. With its advanced features and unparalleled quality, it's truly a game-changer in its category. I believe in its value and am confident it will exceed your expectations. I'm extending this exclusive opportunity to you at a special introductory price of $180. This is an excellent chance to experience the benefits of our product while also securing a great deal. I look forward to hearing your response. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $180. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $180
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $100
